paper_abstract: In this paper, we construct a nonlinear wavelet estimator of conditional density function for a left truncation model. We provide an asymptotic expression for the mean integrated squared error (MISE) of the estimator. It is assumed that the lifetime observations form a stationary alpha-mixing sequence. Unlike for kernel estimator, the MISE expression of the nonlinear wavelet estimator is not affected by the presence of discontinuities in the curves.
paper_title: NONLINEAR WAVELET ESTIMATION OF CONDITIONAL DENSITY UNDER LEFT-TRUNCATED AND alpha-MIXING ASSUMPTIONS
